lead_paragraph: Diego Valeri, Jack Jewsbury and Fanendo Adi scored second-half goals while both teams played a man short to help the Portland Timbers beat Sporting Kansas City 3-0 on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Valeri, Jewsbury, Adi Scores, Timbers Top Sporting KC 3-0
headline.main: Valeri, Jewsbury, Adi Scores, Timbers Top Sporting KC 3-0

snippet: Diego Valeri, Jack Jewsbury and Fanendo Adi scored second-half goals while both teams played a man short to help the Portland Timbers beat Sporting Kansas City 3-0 on Sunday....
